metadata.title: CVE-2020-8859 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-preview 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: This vulnerability allows remote attackers to create a denial-of-servicecondition on affected installations of ELOG Electronic Logbook3.1.4-283534d. Authentication is not required to exploit thisvulnerability. The specific flaw exists within the processing of HTTPparameters. A crafted request can trigger the dereference of a nullpointer. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to create adenial-of-service condition. Was ZDI-CAN-10115.

criterions.comment: elog package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
